bug.author: parachutel
bug.summary: Version error in setup.py with atari-py
bug.description: In setup.py, it requires: 'atari-py<0.2.0' and 'gym[atari,box2d,classic_control]' + GYM_VERSION with GYM_VERSION = '==0.15.4'. But in gym-0.15.4 setup.py requires: 'atari': ['atari_py~=0.2.0', 'Pillow', 'opencv-python'] There is a version conflict for atari-py.
